name: Blogging at Orbital Velocity
tagline: A small step towards our future in orbital space!
body:
### Welcome to Orbital Velocity

This blog documents the development steps of the Orbital series as well as the overall goal and philosophy at Orbital Velocity. I hope this will spur a community around orbital physics in games, media, and mainstream culture, it's implications in how we live our future, and where we may go given a set of realistic scientific and technological constraints.

### To Interplanetary Space!
Ever since the 2009 Gizmodo article on what actual [space combat](http://gizmodo.com/5426453/the-physics-of-space-battles) would look like (this is the 2014 one, couldn't find the older one)

***


### Orbital Vector
### Orbital Domination

Orbital Vector

### About Me
A grad student who should be working on his thesis, but loves loves loves space and gaming and hard science fiction.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
